Survey of important developments of Chinese society and culture from the early 20th century to the present. course_name: FASHION AND DESIGN IN THE FRANCOPHONE WORLD
description: A study of the world of French fashion and design: origins and history, what's new and exciting in French fashion today and attitudes about fashion and beauty of design that have given the French the inside track on prestige in this arena for centuries.
